name: Three Wishes
description:
Play as Delwyn, the baker's delivery boy, and deliver pies to clients. Each one is a long time friend each with a wish in their hearts. Discover their wishes through the choices you make, and you may have a chance to make their wishes come true.

For the Story Route tips, keep scrolling down.

For more art please visit:

betsyillustration.deviantart.com

betsyrobin.tumblr.com

**Image Heavy!!**

Please be very patient when playing online. Depending on your connection speed, it may take up to 2 minutes to load a screen.

In de-bugging mode for a while, downloadable options will once again be available once editing is complete.

Story Route Tips:

Directly asking someone about their wish will result in their bad ending.

*It doesn't matter if you give Pyt money or not.

If you do not feed the fish, bird, or old man, you get Sorcha's ending.
